Summary: At first we thought it may be a "falling star", but it was too big and green in color.
divs: sighting detailsmy boyfriend and i were driving on 58 east near danville va. to the right of the windshield we both saw an object falling from the sky at around 10pm, thursday dec.29,2011. it was above a field to our right about 3\4 the length of a football field away from us. it was probably about 500 ft in the air, and to me, it looked to be the size of a kids hula hoop. it glowed green with some white in the middle. it dissipated about 50-75 ft above the ground. it probably only lasted for 30 seconds, but it seemed like a while. if we hadn't both seen it, i would have never told anyone for fear of sounding insane! was wondering if anyone else witnessed this or knows what it could have been...we thought meteor? falling star? but definitely not fireworks!
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Danville
There were no other sightings in Danville on or around December 29th 2011
